title: Same Theme
text: Same theme ensures all your elements follow a consistent design and format, which is saved in the theme.

title: Using Paint Formatting
text: Using the Paint button would be able to transfer the formatting, but it is not an automatic process and therefore much less efficient.

title: Data Validation
text: This allows you to set rules on what users can enter. However, this process is manual and not the most efficient.

title: Protected Sheets
text: This allows you to make sure certain cells or ranges remain unedited. This will not be able to create a theme to copy to multiple inventory reports without copying the content in the protected cells as well.
